page.title: 07Summer Fayre-June 15th.1985
page.content: The Chew Magna Fayre took place in an atmosphere of fun.There were many stalls-Hot Dog,Shave the Balloon,Knock a Coconut,Bash a Rat,Wood Louse Race etc.An air bed was there too. A band led the floats which included entries from Playgroup(Chimney Sweeps) Brownies(Sleeping Beauty), Sunday School(First Sunday School) and the Primary School with the winning entry'St George and the Dragon' and Picture Book. There was a water race where you carried a bucket of water up a ladder, slid it down a rope on a winch,ran along a plank with a bucket and poured it into a churn. An egg and spoon race was held where competitors dressed up in BIG hats,BIG floppy shoes and used BIG floppy hands to carry BIG eggs and spoons.
